characterCounter.title: Character Counter
characterCounter.description: Count characters, words, and lines in your text

hero.title: Easy & Simple! High-Performance Character Counter (Free)
hero.description: Our free, reliable tool instantly counts characters, line breaks, and bytes in real-time! Perfect for social media posts, essays, ad copy, and more.

input.title: Enter Text
input.description: Copy & paste or directly type/edit text in the input area.
input.note: ※Characters, line breaks, words (English only), and bytes (multibyte supported) are counted instantly as you type.

realtime.description: Various counts are displayed in real-time as you type, allowing for immediate confirmation.

utilize.title: Utilize Results
utilize.description: Results can be copied using the copy button. Use the displayed counts for social media posts, ad copy, essay writing, and more.

writer.name: Tanaka, Writer
writer.comment: This character counter is simple yet powerful, significantly improving my work efficiency. The word count feature for English text is particularly helpful.

social.name: Kawaguchi, Social Media Manager
social.comment: The real-time counting feature is convenient. It's invaluable for checking character counts while editing article content and verifying text for character-limited social media posts!

marketer.name: Yamamoto, Web Marketer
marketer.comment: I love the feature that shows how many times specific characters appear! I use it to check how many times SEO keywords appear on competitors' pages.

easy.title: Easy and Simple Operation for Anyone to Use Immediately
easy.description: Just input text, and character count, line breaks, and bytes are counted in real-time, displaying accurate results.

accurate.title: High-Performance Calculation Engine with Guaranteed Accuracy
accurate.description: Handles complex text and multiple languages. Counts not only characters but also line breaks, words (English only), and bytes (multibyte supported) simultaneously.

free.title: Use the Free Version Without Worrying About Cost!
free.description: Designed to be free and reliable to use, with pro plans available for advanced features.

darkMode.title: Eye-Friendly Design with Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Features eye-friendly dark mode. Comfortable to use during night time or extended work sessions.

what.question: What is a character counter?
what.answer: A character counter is a tool that instantly calculates and displays the number of characters in input text. This prevents manual counting errors and enables efficient text creation and editing.

usage.question: In what scenarios can it be used?
usage.answer:
Here are the main use cases:
Writing & Blogging: Use it to adhere to specified character count guidelines when creating articles.
Social Media Posts: Utilize it to check optimal length for posts with character limits like Twitter and ad copy.
SEO Optimization: Manage article volume and adjust structure for search engine optimization.

counting.question: How are full-width and half-width characters counted?
counting.answer: While specifications vary by application, generally, both full-width and half-width characters are appropriately recognized and accurately counted. Many can count special characters and line breaks as well. We recommend checking the specifications before use.

languages.question: Does it support multiple languages?
languages.answer: Many character counters support not only Japanese but also English and other languages. They are designed to handle international usage by accurately processing characters and symbols for each language.

pricing.question: What's the difference between free and paid versions?
pricing.answer:
While it varies by application, generally:
Free Version: Basic character counting features are available, often limited to simple functions.
Paid Version: Typically offers additional features like advanced statistics (word count, line count, space and symbol counting), customization options, integration with other tools, and ad-free experience.

oneClick.description: This tool features a simple interface where new words appear instantly with just a button click. The intuitive operation requires no special knowledge or setup, making it readily available whenever inspiration strikes.

database.title: Rich Word Database
database.description: Our database covers numerous genres and categories. From everyday words to technical terms, and even unexpected words that spark creative thinking, we offer a wide range of options. This diversity makes the tool valuable for writers, designers, marketers, and professionals across various fields.

design.title: Intuitive and User-Friendly Design
design.description: The simple yet sophisticated design allows users to focus immediately on their intended operations. With responsive design optimized for smartphones and tablets, you can comfortably use the tool from any device.

scenes.title: Diverse Applications
scenes.writer: Writer's Ideation: When stuck while writing, use it as a keyword source for new inspiration. It's helpful in various situations, from blog titles and catchphrases to story concept development.

writer.name: Blog Writer A
writer.quote: I use it whenever I need fresh ideas. The simple operation produces diverse words, often leading to unexpected insights.

designer.name: Graphic Designer B
designer.quote: Using this tool in the initial design phase helps me gain perspectives I might otherwise miss. It's brought fresh energy to my projects!

algorithm.title: Unique Algorithm
algorithm.description: The tool incorporates a random number generation algorithm that displays different words with each button press. This algorithm efficiently generates diverse word combinations to help users gain new inspiration.

database.title: Extensive Word Database
database.description: The database includes words from literature, daily conversation, business terminology, and creative keywords across various fields. Regular updates add new words based on current trends and user needs, continuously expanding the tool's capabilities.

performance.title: Performance and Security
performance.description: The design is lightweight and fast, optimized for instant word generation. User input data and usage patterns are never stored, ensuring safe usage. Privacy and security considerations support reliable service operation.

free.question: Is this tool free to use?
free.answer: Yes, it's basically free to use. All features are available without restrictions, though we plan to announce future database expansions and premium features separately.

words.answer: We randomly generate words from a wide range of categories, from everyday terms to technical vocabulary and unique words that promote creative thinking. Diverse words are provided each time to meet user needs.

commercial.question: Can I use it for commercial purposes?
commercial.answer: Yes, commercial use is permitted. However, you must comply with our terms of use. Please check the terms of use page for specific conditions and restrictions.

mobile.question: Can I use it from mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Yes, we've adopted responsive design, so you can comfortably use it from smartphones and tablets. Word generation works smoothly on any device.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.description: This Random Word Generator is the perfect tool for drawing out creative ideas and supporting daily ideation and brainstorming. With its simple operation, rich word database, and advanced algorithm, it powerfully supports your creativity. We invite all creators seeking new perspectives and ideas to try this tool and capture inspiration for their next steps.
